message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $850,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could be willing to come down to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $900,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875,000. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
